Level 1 Transmutation Spell

Conjure four magical berries into your or a companion's inventory. Creatures who eat a berry regain 1~4 hit points. Berries disappear after a Long Rest.

Goodberry is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Goodberry is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Goodberry Information

Description: Conjure four magical berries into your or a companion's inventory. Creatures who eat a berry regain 1~4 hit points. Berries disappear after a Long Rest. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None

How to Acquire Goodberry

Goodberry can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Ranger Goodberry can be cast by using the following Items: Goodberry Potion Scroll of Goodberry

Goodberry Potion Scroll of Goodberry

Goodberry Tips & Notes

You can use the created Goodberry as a Camp Supply Sack resource, each berry giving you 1 Camp Supply Sack.
